articles.author: Michail
articles.title: Sony confirms PS5 price hike across several regions - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The PS5 Digital Edition will be more expensive in Europe, Australia and New Zealand. Sony is raising PlayStation 5 prices in Europe, Australia and New...
articles.content: Sony is raising PlayStation 5 prices in Europe, Australia and New Zealand from today. Sony announced that it will raise its recommended retail price (RRP) due to the challenging economic environment,… [+1607 chars]
